kill().details: Accrued inflation can still be claimed from the gauge after shutdown.

stakeFor(address,uint256).notice: Stake amount of AMM token on behalf of another account.

params.account: Account for which tokens will be staked.

unstakeFor(address,uint256).notice: Unstake amount of AMM token and send to another account.

params.dst: Account to which unstaked AMM tokens will be sent.
